definition: to retract testimony/to withdraw a confession
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: In this case, enters the defendant who the court stands trial to be very possibly in court retracts a confession.
sentences.chinese: 在這種情況下，走進法庭受審的被告很可能當庭翻供。

sentences.english: Any subject abide by its commitments and promissory estoppel.
sentences.chinese: 任何主體信守自己的承諾及允諾後不得翻供。

sentences.english: Chapter II study of the bribery case, evidence of the use of bribery were retracted.
sentences.chinese: 第二章研究了受賄案件中受賄人翻供的證據運用。

sentences.english: Withdrawn confession is an outstanding problem in the criminal judicature activities in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 翻供，是近年來刑事司法活動中比較突出的一個問題。

definition: to commit sb for trial/to bring sb for interrogation
to collude to fabricate a story
oral confession (as opposed to 筆供|笔供[bi3 gong4])/statement/deposition
on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to commit a crime or offence
